snippet: The new versions of the Chevrolet Silverado and GMC Sierra are the first complete redesigns since 2006.
abstract: General Motors unveils full redesigns of its Chevrolet Silverado and GMC Sierra pickup trucks; company has lagged far behind Ford Motor and Chrysler, who have both benefited from rising sales in the lucrative pickup market as economic recovery has strengthened.
lead_paragraph: The new versions of the Chevrolet Silverado and GMC Sierra are the first complete redesigns since 2006.

headline.seo: To Profit From Rising Sales, G.M. Redesigns Pickups
headline.main: To Gain From Rising Sales, G.M. Redesigns Pickups
headline.print_headline: To Gain From Rising Sales, G.M. Redesigns Pickups
